nodes.excerpt: PathMatch is reinventing campus recruiting helping companies discover, engage, and hire matched student and new grad talent through our smart marketplace. Students curate their video-based profiles which act as a one-click application to matched opportunities.
nodes.title: PathMatch - Hire the best new grads and interns
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Meet Craftly.AI, your new AI-Powered Copywriter that has been turning heads with the original and creative content it generates in seconds. With 75+ tools and expanding, Craftly generates unlimited copy for blogs, web, ads, brand assets, emails and more.
nodes.title: Craftly.AI - AI copywriting tool for marketing & sales copy

nodes.excerpt: Collaborate, Publish and Measure your content in one place. Video tutorials are available at https://academy.storychief.io

nodes.title: ICANSELL - Create a sales kit, find salespeople, pay only for the deal

nodes.excerpt: Polka is an app that enters your Zoom meetings. While you focus on the discussion and challenges, she takes care of structure, admin and even fun. Make visible improvements of your meetings (the basic building block of teamwork).
nodes.title: Polka - Zoom app that makes meetings clear and organized
nodes.author: Dawid Kubicius

nodes.excerpt: Overpower your outreach with AI-enabled prospecting and copywriting for your cold emailing efforts. While you sleep, Ernest finds prospects from companies similar to your existing clients and drafts tailored emails to start the sales conversation for you.
nodes.title: Ernest - An AI that finds prospects and drafts tailored sales emails

nodes.excerpt: Facebook Ad Hunter uncovers hidden audiences to target when running Facebook Ads. Tap into lucrative new audiences your competitors don't know exist, reduce your CPA costs and get better performance from Facebook ads. 100% Free.
nodes.title: Facebook Ad Hunter - Discover hidden audiences on Facebook

nodes.excerpt: Redact.photo offers free and private censoring of images in the browser. It works on both mobile and desktop, and securely scrambles image data.

nodes.excerpt: Twist is asynchronous messaging for the flexible future of work. Break free from the 9-to-5 and the constant meetings, emails, and Slack chats. Join the async work revolution where you â€” not your teammates â€” dictate your schedule.
nodes.title: Twist 2.0 - For teams burnt out by real-time chat, work async, not ASAP
nodes.author: Amir Salihefendic

nodes.excerpt: This tool parses HTML code to identify what causes bloated document responses. For example, you might find that there are large inline images or that there's a big chunk of JSON for hydrating a single-page app.
nodes.title: HTML Size Analyzer - Identify the cause of bloated HTML code

nodes.excerpt: Daffy makes giving a habit. Contribute cash, stock, or crypto, watch it grow tax-free, and donate to 1.5M+ charities in the U.S. Daffy is the Donor-Advised Fund for Youâ„¢, a not-for-profit community built around a new, modern platform for giving.
nodes.title: Daffy - A new, modern platform for giving

nodes.title: Nuxt 3 Beta - The Hybrid Vue(3) Framework

nodes.title: cocoNFT - Sell your Instagram posts as NFTs

nodes.title: Heron Data - Better transaction data for fintechs serving SMBs

nodes.excerpt: Every weekday Noah Brier & Colin Nagy (and friends) send an email about something interesting. We try to keep things under 800 words and be explicit on just why the topic is interesting.
nodes.title: Why is this interesting? - A daily newsletter for the intellectually omnivorous.

nodes.excerpt: Call your prospects at the right time, no matter where you are. Use your cell phone to reach out, follow up and stay connected. Try Woodpecker Calls to get closer to your ideal customers.
nodes.title: Woodpecker Calls - Leads in your pocket to schedule & track sales calls

nodes.excerpt: Paragon is the easiest way to ship embedded, customer-facing integrations between your product and third-party SaaS apps. With our new Custom Integration Builder, you can now build integrations with any SaaS app in minutes - as long as it has a public API.
nodes.title: Paragon Custom Integration Builder - Embed any integration in your SaaS product 10x faster

nodes.excerpt: Clash is a space to connect with your ride-or-dies. SHOOT VIDEOS: Everyone is a Creator on Clash so flex your creativity. SEND DROPS: Show your support. Send it - itâ€™s that easy. LEVEL UP: Join a thread. Show some love. Send Fan Mail. Shoot videos. Send drops.

nodes.title: PO File Editor - Free editor for translations in portable object files

nodes.excerpt: Open Makers is a community for those of you who are "building in public" and want to share your maker journey. Share important product milestones, metrics, articles and so much more...
nodes.title: Open Makers - Community of makers who build in public

nodes.title: Interakt - Grow your business faster on WhatsApp Business

nodes.excerpt: How do you get smart training without a professional coach? You can easily do it with our mobile app! It combines computer vision, the expertise of trainers, rehabilitation specialists, and, most important â€“ a world-class athlete's experience. Time to train!
nodes.title: Professional Weightlifting - Training & nutrition app for un-professional weightlifters

nodes.excerpt: Apply to millions of jobs on the web in 1-click with our browser extension. Discover positions that uniquely fit your interests & background, and track your outgoing applications using our website. Spend time preparing for the interview, not applying to jobs.
nodes.title: Simplify - Autofill job applications and apply anywhere in one click
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: Vimcal is the worldâ€™s fastest calendar, beautifully designed for people who work remotely and live in their calendars. It comes fully-featured with timezone conversion, booking links, keyboard shortcuts, and everything else a modern calendar app should have.
nodes.title: Vimcal - Superhuman for Calendar
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Xano is the fastest way to build a scalable backend for your App using No Code. Each Xano account comes with a scalable server, a flexible database, and a No Code API builder that can transform, filter, and integrate with data from anywhere.
nodes.title: Xano - The fastest way to build and deploy a scalable backend
nodes.author: KP

nodes.excerpt: Defi Llama is a dashboard that provides cross-chain data on the state of Decentralized Finance. They're committed to accuracy and transparency. I've found it really useful for exploring new ecosystems!
nodes.title: DefiLlama - Defi Dashboard

nodes.excerpt: Find similar YouTube channels, discover new channels based on your interests, create your own YouTube collections with your favorite channels. Contribute and help other community members to find channels they are looking for.
nodes.title: SimilarChannels - Find similar YouTube channels easily

nodes.excerpt: Typli.AI is the most intuitive A.I Content tool which combines AI Writing and an SEO Assistant that can help you save time and write smarter. Typli.ai can understand your instructions, simply use our +100 writing commands and let the magic happen!
nodes.title: Typli.AI - The intuitive AI Writing tool which combines AI and SEO
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Too shy for TikTok? Canâ€™t get into Clubhouse? Want to cheer up a friend? Forgot your grannyâ€™s bday? With our tool you can Record and add a sound from our library. They stack up vertically so the sounds are easy to see & move. Laughter guaranteed!
nodes.title: Loops Audio - Fun short easy audio messages
nodes.author: Lianne Bergeron

nodes.excerpt: The most sustainable Fairphone yet, now with 5G speed, 5-year warranty and electronic waste neutral. You donâ€™t need to be an expert to swap out the battery or display. No part of Fairphone 4 is glued shut, so you can choose to easily repair it yourself.
nodes.title: Fairphone 4 - A sustainable, modular phone built to last
nodes.author: Calum Webb

nodes.excerpt: mixmello is a free, open source tool to create remixed versions of your favourite playlists. Search for the Spotify playlist you want to remix, tailor the remixes to your liking (with song previews), then save the playlist with a single click.
nodes.title: mixmello - Create remixed versions of your favourite Spotify playlists
nodes.author: Alex Gurr

nodes.excerpt: codeStarter is the fastest way to go from project idea to code for your web apps! Simply enter your idea and preferred development stacks, and we'll generate the necessary files for your project with GPT-3.
nodes.title: codeStarter - Build web apps with natural language!

nodes.excerpt: Plans makes it easy to expand your social life and keep track of it using a streamlined event calendar. Use the app to plan fun activities, meet new people, meet friends, and make meaningful experiences in real life. Plans is the event organizer for everyone!
nodes.title: Plans - The ultimate social event planner app for real-life meetups!
nodes.author: Adnan Kharuf

nodes.excerpt: Promoted unifies organic search, promotions, and ads in one optimized system for marketplaces. We sort your marketplace search and promote the best listings at the top to increase revenue. http://promoted.ai
nodes.title: Promoted.ai - Search and feed ranking for marketplaces

nodes.excerpt: Backstage lets CH creators record their rooms & gives them a place to share for replay. Recordings shared on BS include a transcript, making it the first place for the Deaf and HoH community to have easy access to the knowledge shared in CH rooms.
nodes.title: Backstage for Clubhouse - Record & Replay your CH rooms
nodes.author: baileydrake

nodes.excerpt: Form new habits, follow existing ones. Find time for them in your tight schedule. Log emotions, feelings and thoughts. Track progress and don't forget your everyday duties and deadlines. We build tee to make your dai- ly routine something unique and exciting!
nodes.title: Next - Daily routine & goals planner

nodes.excerpt: Browser based annotation tool. Free and easy to markup images. Upload any images or take screenshot of your screen. Without any accounts. Just annotate!
nodes.title: Annotate Screen - Markup your image or screenshot of your screen

nodes.excerpt: CreatorScout is a platform to find Twitter users who share your interests. Discover underrated content creators, match 1:1 to make new friends, grow your audience, and much more.
nodes.title: CreatorScout - Discover Twitter accounts to follow and promote your own
nodes.author: Alyssa X

nodes.excerpt: Writing meta descriptions is not fun. Use our fine tuned GPT-3 model to do it for you.
nodes.title: Meta Description Generator - Let GPT-3 write meta descriptions for your web pages
